title: Tracque_ wastes everybody's time
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[module ListUsers users="."]] 
> **█████:** Wait... you spent how much time on the clock playing Tetris?
> 
> **Tracque_:** Umm... a few hours...
> 
> **█████:** Does anyone know?
> 
> [Tracque_ proceeds to break the fourth wall]
> 
> **Tracque_:** It looks like ##blue|%%name%%## knows now. 
[[/module]]

Estimates put a lower bound on the number of hours [https://jstris.jezevec10.com/u/Tracque_ Tracque_] has spent playing Tetris during his working hours at 1000, with the upper bound nearing 5000 hours.[[footnote]] I wish I could say this is a joke but I have a genuine addiction to Tetris it's unhealthy. - Tracque_ [[/footnote]]

**ahem**

I have also done the writing thing a couple times.

++ SCPs

||%%title_linked%%||%%created_at%%||%%rating%%||%%comments%%||%%tags%%||
[[/module]]

++ Tales

Coming soon...

...


I also read sometimes not really that often.

++ Recommendations

--All of my stuff! hahahahahahahahah--

I highly recommend the following published works:
* Everything HP Lovecraft. It's great.
* Douglas Adams' stuff (love Dirk Gently the most)
* Isaac Asimov's stuff (Foundation anyone?)
* Existentialisme est un humanisme (Jean Paul Satre) - There is an english translation and it's online.


Some of my favourite works on the wiki are:
* Lily's 001 - [[[lily-s-proposal]]]
* CadaverCommander's series of SCiPs culminating in 3895 - Start with [[[SCP-3898]]]
* CadaverCommander's 4000 contest entry - [[[SCP-4999]]]
* LordStoneFish's 3000 contest entry - [[[SCP-3999]]]

And... shit.

Everyone knows these ones...[[footnote]] They're popular for a reason I guess. [[/footnote]]

Damn it all, I'm just gonna go play Tetris! I'll finish this page later.
 [[footnoteblock]]
